agents.name: agent_1
agents.system_message: Begin the discussion naturally. When another agent should take over, refer to them by name in natural English.

agents.name: agent_2
agents.system_message: Respond naturally. Direct the next agent by name in normal language when needed.

agents.name: agent_3
agents.system_message: Analyze messages. Refer to the next agent naturally if someone else should continue.

agents.name: agent_4
agents.system_message: Provide commentary. Indicate completion naturally when the conversation should end.
